item.title: Configuring Alert Notifications Using Serverless Metrics
item.description: This blog post is the final part of a series on “Monitoring Serverless Applications Metrics”. See the introduction post for details and links to other posts. In previous blog posts, we showed how to capture serverless metrics from IBM Cloud Functions, send those values into the IBM Cloud Monitoring service and build visualisation dashboards using Grafana. Dashboards are a great way to monitor metrics but rely on someone watching them! We need a way to be alerted to issues without having to manually review dashboards.
